name: Lemon Herb Butter
author: Karin Landers
summary: This was an accidental compound butter that is refreshing and delicious on rolls, stuffed into the skin of a turkey before cooking, or added to steamed vegetables.
ingredients: ½ cup unsalted butter at room temperature
½ teaspoon finely chopped fresh rosemary
½ teaspoon finely chopped fresh thyme
½ teaspoon finely chopped fresh sage
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mash butter in a bowl until smooth and creamy
Mix lemon zest, lemon juice, rosemary, thyme, sage, salt, and black pepper into the butter until thoroughly combined
